• : About
  • Gallery

Did you know that computer art is a thing? Dot:Dot generates random, unique tattoos with a help of Processing.js

Take a look at the gallery where real tattoo’s generated by Dot:Dot are presented. And be sure to generate one yourself!

You’ve already done it? Send it to us! We’ll be happy to see your picture in our gallery!

Dot:Dot is made by Ksenia Karelskaya for herself and her friends, who were willing to have a simple, minimalistic but unique tattoos.
